snippet: Los Tigres del Norte, a norteño band, has been forbidden by the city government of Ciudad Juárez, Mexico, to play further shows there after a set that included "La Reina del Sur (The Queen of the South)," a song that the government says glorifies...
abstract: Los Tigres del Norte, a norteño band, has been forbidden by the city government of Ciudad Juárez, Mexico, to play further shows there after a set that included "La Reina del Sur (The Queen of the South)," a song that the government says glorifies drug trafficking.

headline.main: Los Tigres del Norte Banned in Mexican City
headline.print_headline: A Mexican City Bans Los Tigres del Norte
